Translations.Text: He lead his people Feria Resurrection totus the via to Hell; quod miserable abode to vivens in
They incurred condemnation in hoc vita alias prout on Feria Resurrection; quod miserable path subsequentis
Hoc est news elapsus communities nos narrate vos. Some est adhuc standing some vanished
Nos nunquam wronged them; they wronged their suus anima. Their deus they invoked DEUS non help them in the parvus when judgment tuus Dominus advenit. In fact, they unus ensured their doom
Such retribution enforced tuus Dominus when communities transgressed Indeed His retribution est painful devastating
Hoc est lesson those fear retribution Hereafter Ut est feria when totus people summoned - Feria testis
Nos appointed specific temporis it take locus
Feria it advenit non pass anima utter single word prout His testimentum! Some est miserable some est happy
Prout pro miserable unus they est Hell wherein they sigh wail
Eternally they abide therein prout long prout caelum terra endure prout testimentum tuus Dominus. Tuus Dominus est doer de whatever He testimentum
Prout pro fortunate unus they est Paradise. Eternally they abide therein prout long prout caelum terra endure prout testimentum tuus Dominus - everlasting reward
